caption.title: Irrigation potential (ha) in the Upper Ouémé watershed under current and future climate and water-use scenarios.
caption.p: Superscript a indicates that irrigation potential estimates represent the 2040s under the SSPs and baseline climate. For 2090s, irrigation potential under baseline climate and SSP1 was 36,100 ha whereas it was 26,900 ha under baseline climate and SSP3.
